actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to authorize financial assistance for the Washington Research Library Consortium.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide financial assistance to the Washington Research Library Consortium for a facility in Prince Georges County, Maryland, that would link by computer eight university libraries in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area (District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia). Authorizes appropriations. Makes specified funds under the Higher Education Act of 1965 available for expenditure under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize financial assistance for the Washington Research Library Consortium.
